item.description:
Let's get together and check out the garden grounds. We'll meet in the at 10:30 am in the parking lot and make a plan. There is an 8.00 admission fee so please bring cash! At Tower Hill, you can stroll the many gardens and woodland trails to explore nature, take a contemplative break. There is a cafe on the grounds or we can pack a picnic. Let's wander around and maybe meet up for lunch together. We'll discuss details when we arrive...

Here is some info and thier web site:
http://www.towerhillb...

Bring sunblock, a hat, drink, lunch or snack, camera gear...

From Boston:
Take the Massachusetts Turnpike to Exit 11A for Route 495. Take Route 495 north to Exit 25B for Route 290 west. Follow toward Worcester. Take Exit 24, Church Street, Northborough/Boylston. Follow to Boylston 3 miles. Entrance to Tower Hill on right; dark red sign designates entrance.

In Worcester, take the exit for Route 290 east. Follow through the city to Exit 24, Church Street, Northborough/Boylston. Follow to Boylston 3 miles. Entrance to Tower Hill on right; dark red sign designates entrance.
Garden Etiquette

For your own enjoyment and safety, and to protect and preserve the plants, please follow these simple rules:
? Stay on paths or lawns.
? Dispose of trash properly.
? Park in designated areas only.
? Enjoy your picnic, but no alcohol, please.
? Footwear and shirts must be worn at all times.
? Leave all plants, flowers and wildlife undisturbed.
? Leave pets at home. Assistance animals welcome!
? Youths under 16 must be accompanied by an adult.
? Commercial/wedding photography permitted by appointment.
? Enjoy the tranquility; radios and musical instruments are not allowed.
? No smoking in the buildings, or along trails through fields and woodland.
? No climbing on rock walls or statuary, running, barbecuing or active sports (frisbee, ball playing, kite flying, biking etc.).

I have a call into them to see about a group discount rate so please RSVP ASAP!

Thanks Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Click and Shoot: Tower Hill Botanic Garden
